item.title: OkeyMeta AI: The "Built From Scratch" Myth Debunked!
item.description:
This high-energy radio segment, featuring host Puck, discusses the correction issued by Techpoint Africa regarding the OkeyMeta AI. Initially reported as an LLM built from scratch, it was clarified that while Okechukwu Nwaozor developed a functional AI system, it is a hybrid model based on open-source frameworks like Google's Gemma-2B, rather than a ground-up LLM which would require immense resources. The segment emphasizes the importance of accurate reporting while still celebrating Nwaozor's significant innovative achievement.
Hosts: Host: Oliver Adekunle
